resources.string: No breached accounts and no pastes have been found.
%d breached account(s) or paste(s) have been found.

Certain breaches are particularly sensitive in that someone\'s presence in the breach may adversely impact them if others are able to find that they were a member of the site. These breaches are classed as \"sensitive\" and may not be publicly searched.
A retired breach is typically one where the data does not appear in other locations on the web, that is it\'s not being traded or redistributed.
